statements: DELETE FROM Recycling_materials WHERE material_name = 'Glass' AND volume > 100;
DELETE FROM Recycling_materials WHERE weight > 100 AND volume < 50;
DELETE FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_name = 'Green Earth Recycling';
DELETE FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_id = 3 AND company_name='Green Solutions';
DELETE FROM RecyclingCompanies WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM CollectionRecords WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM material_types WHERE material_name = 'Plastic Bottles';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE collection_id = 1 AND transaction_amount > 500.00;
